question: 香川県
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>fragrance</kanji> <kanji>river</kanji> <kanji>prefecture</kanji> is <vocabulary>Kagawa Prefecture</vocabulary>. Might help to look at the reading first.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This reading is made up of the kun'yomi readings for <ja>香</ja> and <ja>川</ja> (rendaku'd) and the on'yomi reading for <ja>県</ja>. You haven't learned this reading for <ja>香</ja> yet, so here's a mnemonic to help:

If you want to get to <vocabulary>Kagawa Prefecture</vocabulary> you're going to need a <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). It's all the way over on Shikoku island, and you won't be able to cross the big bridge without a proper car!
